The course will provide you with a non-technical overview of data science, and types of techniques. The focus will lie on critical thinking and the full DS process (based on CRISP). About the author Witek ten Hove is a senior instructor and researcher at HAN University of Applied Sciences. His main areas of expertise are Data en Web Technologies. Through his extensive business experience in Finance and International Trade and thorough knowledge of modern data technologies, he is able to make connections between technology and business. As an open source evangelist he firmly believe in the power of knowledge sharing. His mission is to inspire business professionals and help them exploit the full potential of smart technologies.
